General.Name: Adhi Commuter Properti Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Adhi Commuter Properti Tbk operates as a mass transportation-based property developer in Indonesia. It is also involved in hotel management, construction, real estate trading activities. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT Adhi Commuter Properti Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Adhi Karya (Persero) Tbk.
General.Address: Jl. Pengantin Ali No.88 Ciracas, Jakarta Timur, Indonesia, 13740

1.Name: Mochamad  Yusuf
1.Title: Director of Fin., Risk Management & HR and Director
